solution_line_template: 4 pizzas at ${total_cost} per pizza is ${total_cost}/{num_pizzas} = $<<{total_cost}/{num_pizzas}={cost_per_pizza}>>{cost_per_pizza} per pizza.
If there were {pieces_per_pizza} pieces per pizza, then each piece was worth ${cost_per_pizza}/{pieces_per_pizza} = $<<{cost_per_pizza}/{pieces_per_pizza}={cost_per_piece}>>{cost_per_piece}.
